Package database.jpa

Class DBTools

  • java.lang.Object
    • database.jpa.DBTools
  • public class DBTools
extends Object
    Class providing functions for database manipulating.

      void addGamer​(Gamer gamer)

    • Method Detail

      • addGamer

        public void addGamer​(Gamer gamer)
        Inserts a row with the data of the player into the database, if it is not present yet.
        Parameters:
        gamer - a Gamer object, which provides data of the player.

      • updateGamer

        public void updateGamer​(Gamer gamer)
        Updates the row in the database, which contains the data of player gamer.
        Parameters:
        gamer - a Gamer object, which provides data of the player.

      • saveGame

        public void saveGame​(SaveGame sg)
        Inserts a row with the data representing the state of the game into the database.
        Parameters:
        sg - a SaveGame object, which represents the state of the game.

      • loadGame

        public SaveGame loadGame​(int ID)
        Downloads and removes the row, which has the ID ID.
        Parameters:
        ID - an int value, representing the ID of the row, which we will work with.
        Returns:
        the game state, which has been selected to load.

      • getTopPlayers

        public List<Gamer> getTopPlayers()
        Selects the top 5 players from the database.
        Returns:
        a list with the top 5 players ordered by the score in descending order.

      • getScoreboard

        public List<Gamer> getScoreboard()
        Selects all the players from the database.
        Returns:
        a list with all the players ordered by score in descending order.

      • getSaves

        public List<SaveGame> getSaves()
        Selects the saved games from the database.
        Returns:
        a list with all the saved games.
